jeremy_irons.name: Jeremy Irons
jeremy_irons.description: Deep, authoritative British voice - Lethal Gentleman
jeremy_irons.ref_text: I became an actor to be a rogue and a vagabond, which is how we used to call actors in England, not to be a knob, which is what we call the aristocrats.
jeremy_irons.pacing_notes: Use punctuation for natural pacing: commas for short pauses, ellipses for longer pauses

pacing_template: Good morning, sir. Your status... is {status}. Body battery, at {battery}. {workout_message}
